channel.title: Posts on 平安喜乐
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 平安喜乐

item.title: Hugo博客搭建指南
item.description: 前言 最近在折腾Hugo静态博客，但是碍于个人水平有限，期间查阅了大量资料进行了诸多尝试才初获成功。因此，在这里记录下整个过程以资备忘。 本文要达成的目的，配置 Hugo 通过 Github Pages 发布后再部署到 Vercel。所需要

item.title: Grotesque_vh 1.0.1
item.description: 一、信息收集 1 使用 arp-scan 找到靶机 arp-scan --interface eth0 10.9.23.0/24 ┌──(root㉿kali)-[~] └─# arp-scan --interface eth0 10.9.23.0/24 Interface: eth0, type: EN10MB, MAC: 00:0c:29:0a:50:19, IPv4: 10.9.23.111 Starting arp-scan 1.10.0 with 256 hosts (https://github.com/royhills/arp-scan) 10.9.23.1 50:6f:77:89:ad:99 HUAWEI TECHNOLOGIES CO.,LTD 10.9.23.10 68:da:73:a9:5c:57 (Unknown) …… 10.9.23.155 08:00:27:9c:83:dc PCS Systemtechnik GmbH …… 10.9.23.233 7c:57:58:67:3c:15 HP Inc. 10.9.23.235 90:2e:16:a8:b9:1c LCFC(HeFei) Electronics Technology co., ltd 10.9.23.238 00:2b:67:39:76:66 LCFC(HeFei) Electronics Technology co., ltd 35 packets received by filter, 0 packets

item.title: DriftingBlues
item.description: nmap 10.9.23.0/24 扫描当前网段，确认靶机 IP：10.9.75.215 详细扫描 ┌──(root㉿kali)-[~] └─# nmap -sV -p- 10.9.23.215 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-01-13 16:53 CST Nmap scan report for bogon (10.9.23.215) Host is up (0.010s latency). Not shown: 65533 closed tcp ports (reset) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.2p2 Ubuntu 4ubuntu2.10 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) 80/tcp

item.title: Lazysysadmin
item.description: 1 信息收集 nmap 扫描当前网段 nmap 10.9.75.0/24 确认靶机 IP：10.9.75.90，对其进行详细扫描 ┌──(root㉿kali)-[~] └─# nmap -sV -p- 10.9.75.90 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-12-08 20:57 EST Nmap scan report for bogon (10.9.75.90) Host is up (0.00071s latency). Not shown: 65529 closed tcp ports (reset) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh
